title: The Legends of Grimous Ironblood: The Curious Battle
description: Arch-Mage Grimous Ironblood's desire to cure all sickness from the realms of Edra burns deep within. Kindrith Swordsmyth is shocked when she discovers a hidden secret buried in her family's past. Brothers Koölbran and Kranbür Agrôth's hatred of each other spills over for one girl's love in their search for the mythical True-Love Rose.Unbeknown, one object binds them all together. A curious bottle contains a magical liquid of immense power. A Cut-purse and general all round low-life, Bracus McGint wants this power for himself and seizes the bottle through magic of his own, unaware of what deadly consequences he has unleashed...Is there anyone alive who can prevent the existence of pure evil?
author: K.R. Boyter
